description.text: -You return the Elytra to Queen Mab, though uncertain of the consequences of your action, the Elytra is now in the hands of the Winter Court. You freedom and life might be a short gift...It may be inevitable as a pixie said long ago when you first met...you accept the embrace of the Fey, and become one of them. You leave your mortal life behind...but a friend is waiting on the other side.-
